SELECT BOARD_NO, NICKNAME, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGDATE, BOARD_ID FROM BOARDMAIN JOIN MEMBERSHIP USING(NICKNAME) ORDER BY BOARD_NO
